About the Company: Oceanaa Biotek Industries Ltd (OBIL) is a specialized food testing laboratory. They are an independent entity of the Oceanaa group of companies with interests in processing of marine products, vegetables and fruits - both for export sector and domestic retail sector. They have a well equipped R&D Lab infrastructure. Core focus is on ensuring complete safety by sampling and testing of each day`s production and to make sure that the seafood process adheres to the highest industry standards and meticulous product specification.
